sentence.Network_en: Bainite transformation has shear nature in crystallography and shear possibility in thermodynamics.
sentence.Network_cn: 贝氏体在晶体学上有切变性质,在热力学上有切变可能.

sentence.Network_en: Protein crystallization is the primary bottleneck step in X - ray protein crystallography.
sentence.Network_cn: 摘要获得具有高分辨率的蛋白质晶体是目前蛋白质结构测定的主要瓶颈.

sentence.Network_en: In x - ray crystallography, crystals of protein are bombarded with intense x - ray beams.
sentence.Network_cn: 在 X 射线结晶中用强脉冲 X 射线束轰击蛋白晶体.
